channel.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal
channel.description: Latest Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comics and news

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Back
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I mean, statistically, shouldn't this be the most common outcome?


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Kill
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
They need to make Baby Not On Board signs, as a courtesy of people trying to drive recklessly in peace.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Hack
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
No really, from now on it's all basically jokes I stole from Janelle Shane.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - AI
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Ever since I got an early copy of Janelle Shane's new book, 80% of my jokes have been about douchey uses of AI.


Today's News:

Just leaving a note here that if you're interested in a pro-immigration fiscal case, that's chapter 3 of the new comic!
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Prank
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
It gets really funny when he unhinges his jaw and starts enveloping and slowly digesting onlookers.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Treasure
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
When someone starts in about the greatest treasure, you know you're about to be screwed.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Both Sides
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
All I'm saying is that it'd work.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Video Games
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
All those kids who grew up on Pac-Man now think it's okay to eat ghosts.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Flat
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I call together this meeting of the Slightly Lumpy Oblate Spheroid Earth society, which *technically* isn't a meeting because I'm the only one here.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Fish
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Before you send an angry email, I'll point out that my first draft was an extended joke about torturing a fish with a human brain.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Cinnamon Buns
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Apparently it's now possible to get a corn dog made with duck fat, presumably so you can lie to yourself about why you're eating a corndog.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Quantum
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Usually when I do a quantum computing joke, I feel the need to apologize to Scott Aaronson. For this particular one, I apologize to Seth Lloyd.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - You
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I mean, if these books actually worked, wouldn't everybody only buy 1?


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Preference
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
'You dunce' really should be a more common feature of casual conversation.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Flour
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
If you point out how stupid this joke is to me, it'll lower total human happiness.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Tundra
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
One day, we will clone the Dodo and reintroduce it to an underwater island.


Today's News:

Hey geeks, if you buy the new book via Barnes and Noble, you can get a free digital comic describe how the project started!
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Critical
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Sometimes you come up with a full idea, and sometimes you start from a pun and work backward.


Today's News:

Thanks, geeks!
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Jurassic
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
I am prepared to offer my services to the writing of Jurassic Park Part 17.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Pood
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
This joke is exactly as complicated as you think it is.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Love
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
All containers of amphetamines just have 'AMPHETAMINES' written on the side in big letters.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
